r.d: This extension allows you to access Oracle Database. OCI8 2.0 can be built with PHP 4.3.9 onwards. OCI8 can be linked with Oracle Database 9.2, 10, 11, or 12.1 client libraries. Oracle's standard cross-version connectivity applies. For example PHP linked with Oracle Database 11.2 client libraries can connect to Oracle Database 9.2 onwards.
r.n: Fixed --enable-maintainer-zts mode. Allow Implicit Result Set statement resources to inherit the parent's current prefetch count. Allow OCI8 to be DTrace-enabled independently from core PHP. Require OCI8 to be configured 'shared' when enabling DTrace support.
